delete from ums_dept_permission where dept_id = #{deptId} and permission_id in
#{id}

delete from ums_role_menu where role_id = #{roleId} and menu_id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select distinct m.id from ums_menu m left join ums_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join ums_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join ums_role r on r.id = ur.role_id where m.status = 0 and r.status = 0 and ur.user_id = #{userId}

select m.id from ums_menu m left join ums_dept_role_permission udrp on m.id = udrp.permission_id left join ums_dept_role udr on udrp.dept_role_id = udr.id left join ums_dept_role_user udru on udr.id = udru.dept_role_id left join ums_admin u on udru.user_id = u.id where u.id = #{userId} and m.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_no;

select ums_menu.id, parent_id, perms, order_no, path, title, component, ignore_keep_alive, affix, icon, frame_src, transition_name, hide_breadcrumb, hide_children_in_menu, hide_tab, hide_menu, is_link, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, menu_type, remark, status, is_frame from ums_menu left join ums_dept_permission udp on ums_menu.id = udp.permission_id where udp.dept_id = #{id}
select m.id from ums_menu m left join ums_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{id}
